Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; glaze fired red-brown; white slip; interior: glazed black; part of lotus flower with added white outline and red fill; below, traces of white bands; exterior, part of a lion’s head to right.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 287, no. 837, pl. 117)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1052) (phase 2)
